name: Revolver Homing
description:
In the game you have a special revolver that shoots a bullet that you can control. The point of the game is to get from A to B and solve the map.

Shot the keys to open the door to the next part of the map.

Right now the game has a tutorial level and a demo level.

What needs to be fixed:

Enemies does not move but can be killed.
Jump is not coded correctly so you can jump a unlimited amount of times.
Animations bugs sometimes.
Boring Starting Zone.
Menu is very basic.
Bullet is destroyed when it touches cursor.

What will be added:

More levels with different sprites.
More enemies.
More mechanices.
More animations.
Better Menu.
Logo.
etc...

How to play:

D = Go right
A = Go Left
Space = Jump
Left Click = Shoot
Right Click = Cancel shot and reload

Shoot Key to open door.
Boxes can be destoryed by bulllet.
